mdRecord.dcterms:title: How the Other Half Loves by Alan Ayckbourn
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for the Sep 13, 1978 production of How the Other Half Loves by Alan Ayckbourn. Directed by Edward Stern. Scenery by Bennet Averyt. Costumes by Carr Garnett. Lighting by Sara Ross Morgan.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
